text: Colin Andrew Mochrie (; born November 30, 1957) is a Scottish-Canadian actor, comedian and writer. He is best known for his work as a regular on both the British and American versions of the improvisational comedy television show Whose Line Is It Anyway?. Mochrie was born in Kilmarnock, Scotland. In 1964, he moved with his family to Canada. He first moved to Montreal, Quebec and finally Vancouver, British Columbia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Montreal Category:Actors from British Columbia Category:Canadian comedians Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Writers from British Columbia
title: Colin Mochrie
